The story revolves around a man named Jones who tries to gain his freedom from prison by joining the army and becoming part of a group called "The Club." However, things turn out to be quite different than what Jones had anticipated. This movie is a classic example of satirical comedy. 
2. Starship Troopers (1959)): This classic science fiction novel by Robert A. Heinlein tells the story of a young man named Kit Carson who decides to join the military as part of the "Starship Troopers" program. However, things turn out to be quite different than what Kit Carson had anticipated. This movie is a classic example of science fiction comedy.
